::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe nods. "Anything about the Predacon setup? Neutral 
powerful factions? Just anything, I guess. As much as I'm thankful 
for your help, I don't really want to end up in this position again."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Zyber stretched again as she looked across the fire at 
> Blaster(DeathScythe), looking over him to see if he really was 
alright. She 
> had to admit if nothing else that he was rather a unique creature, 
looking 
> as if he had scanned every animal, fish, insect, and bird on the 
planet when 
> he had landed.
> But even if he was not quite praportioned right, he was still a 
rather nice 
> bot none the less.
> She smiles as he answeres her.*
> 
> " That is good. I was not sure whether or not that salve would work 
on a bot 
> with as much power as you. I have only used it on myself before."
> 
> *Zyber lay back down onto her stomach as she watched Blaster look 
into the 
> fire and then turn his eyes back at her, though watching every one 
of his 
> moves.
> She was way to trustworthy, she knew that. And she trusted 
sometimes when it 
> could be the worst thing for her.
> But she simply nodded as he thanked her for saving his life, but 
then looked 
> at him point blank when he asked for her to fill in more 
information for her 
> on tis planet.
> However, that was information with which she could give.*
> 
> " There is a bit."
> 
> * Through her scouting and such she had come to know quite a bit, 
but why 
> this Blaster would want to know was beyond her.*
> 
> " There is a new Maximal ship, the Cybertronian Fire. Which is 
located in 
> the plains of Africa.
> There is a new leader for the Predacons.
> Other then that there are other battles but nothing too seriouse.
> Iron Raptor is leading the Maximals.
> The winds are changing and the herds are moving south, leaving 
almost no 
> food in the north here.
> The enire planet is changing in fact, climate, sea level. But 
nothing out of 
> the ordinery."
> 
> * Zyber then stretched again and yawned a bit.*
> 
> " Is there anything specific you would like to know?"
